title: Sweet Bathhouse
overview: Sweet Bathhouse - A simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with a bathhouse theme. It tells the daily life of five beautiful and cute girls in the bathhouse, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery.- The game has three difficulty levels: 2x2, 2x4, and 4x4 puzzles- Press the "F" key to turn on the black and white picture when solving the puzzle- Players can complete the puzzle by pressing the 'blank' key during the game.- Players can quickly view the girls' pictures in the gallery by pressing the AD key, left and right keys, or left and right mouse keys* The puzzle picture size is 800x960 px* The gallery picture size is 1088x960 px
